titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: STEROID TYPE GIVEN TO MOTHER (SNOMED CT DM+D) - Description

div.p: STEROID TYPE GIVEN TO MOTHER (SNOMED CT DM+D) is the same as attribute CLINICAL TERMINOLOGY CODE.

STEROID TYPE GIVEN TO MOTHER (SNOMED CT DM+D) is the SNOMED CT ® concept ID from the NHS Dictionary of Medicines and Devices which is used to identify the type of steroid given to the mother during a Maternity Episode in order to mature the fetal lungs.
Further details of the permitted SNOMED CT ® codes from the NHS Dictionary of Medicines and Devices can be found at the Neonatal Data Analysis Unit website.
